posts.post_content:
I'm slowly adding a few more catcher pose cards to my PCL collection.

I have plenty of items available for trade or I'll gladly pay well for nice examples. I prefer creaseless examples if possible.

Here is a link to my website, so you can see which ones I own currently.



[url]http://home.myfairpoint.net/vintagecatcher/thevintagecatcher/[/url]

Thanks in advance,


Patrick

Here's a list of the 1911 Obak Catcher Pose cards I am still looking for:

Hasty, Spokane, N.W.L.
LaLonge, Sacramento, P.C.L.
Lewis, Vancouver, N.W.L.
Mitze, Oakland, P.C.L.
Pearce, Oakland, PC.L.
Schmidt, San Francisco, P.C.L.
Hugh Smith, Los Angeles, P.C.L.
Spiesman, Vancouver, N.W.L.

I prefer creaseless examples. Back damage is O.K.

Thanks,

Patrick

Here is my updated 1909 Obak catcher pose want list:

Charlie Graham, Sacramento
R. Williams, San Francisco
Carl Lewis, Oakland
Mickey LaLonge, Oakland


Thanks in advance,

Patrick
